text: sillo jaseongeum-eun gananhan jawa bulssanghan jawa geogie jongsahaneun ja wa geudeul-ui ma-eum-i wian-eul bad-eul jawa noyewa chaemu-in jawa hana nim-ui gil-e issneun jawa geuligo yeo haengjadeul-eul wihan geos-ini ineun hana nim-eulobuteoui myeonglyeong-ila hananim-eun asimgwa jihyelo chungmanhasinila
